name: An Absurd Jittery Day (PortDev)
description:
The day is normal, the sky is blue, all is well.

 You go through your normal morning routine, but then, tragedy strikes. The world ends, and you go out knowing you didn't have a life worth living. 

Waking up, you're back in the beginning of the day. 

What will you do this time? Jump into this time twisting, world impacting game today! 

This game includes fully voiced dialogue, and allows you to do things you would never expect in real life. Find hidden achievements! Buy things from the shop! Look at your inventory! 

The possibilities are endless! Who knows what you'll do in this absurd jittery day!

Contact me on my Instagram or Twitter on my profile page!
